snippet: The political news cycle is driven by a fixation on any sign of distress in either campaign. Until Wednesday, that focus had been on Mitt Romney. Now it’s President Obama’s turn.
lead_paragraph: The political news cycle is driven by a fixation on any sign of distress in either campaign. Until Wednesday, that focus had been on Mitt Romney. Now it’s President Obama’s turn.

headline.seo: Debate Is a Feast for the Punditry
headline.main: Presidential Debate Is a Feast for the Punditry
headline.print_headline: Debate Is a Feast for the Punditry
